Sends a message to the administrator email when unauthorized users encounter issues accessing DocSpace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["email","message"],"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The content of the administrator message to be sent.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"email":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"Email","format":"email","nullable":true,"example":"Sydney_Roberts4@hotmail.com"},"culture":{"type":"string","description":"Culture","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the administrator message content.","title":"AdminMessageSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Message about the result of sending a message","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"StringWrapper"}}}},"400":{"description":"Incorrect email or message text is empty"},"429":{"description":"Request limit is exceeded"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
